trait.name: Running Leap
entries: With a 10-foot running start, the Leolis can long jump up to 25 feet.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the leolis moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The leolis sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

trait.name: Shielded Mind
entries: The leolis is immune to scrying and to any effect that would sense its emotions, read its thoughts, or detect its location.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Leolis makes one bite attack and one claw attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Suncharge
entries: The Helianthus regains 5 hit points at the start of each of its turns if it's within direct sunlight and has 1 hit point or more remaining.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The helianthus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Sunray
entries: {@atk sp} {@hit 6} to hit, range 90 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d8 + 4}) radiant damage.

action.name: Healing Spores (1/short rest)
entries: The Helianthus sheds a bunch of healing spores, all creatures within 20 feet of it regain 16 ({@dice 3d10}) hit points

action.name: Sleeping Spores (1/short rest)
entries: The Helianthus sheds a bunch of sleeping spores, all creatures within 10 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 14} constitution save or fall {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Stunning Spores (1/short rest)
entries: The Helianthus sheds a bunch of stunning spores, all creatures within 10 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 14} constitution save or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the Helianthus' next turn.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Snow Camouflage
entries: The wolf has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Cold Breath {@recharge 6}
entries: The wolf exhales a blast of freezing wind in a 10-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The arctic-dwelling winter wolf is as large as a dire wolf but has snow-white fur and pale blue eyes. Frost giants use these evil creatures as guards and hunting companions, putting the wolves' deadly breath weapon to use against their foes. Winter wolves communicate with one another using growls and barks, but they speak Common and Giant well enough to follow simple conversations.
